title: Crick Crack, Monkey - rejects the term "double"

content.prompt: The narrator rejects the term “double” (first sentence of paragraph 7) most likely because it

choices.label: calls up a conflict she had tried to suppress
implies an equality she did not experience
denotes a similarity she was unwilling to acknowledge
hints at a sentiment she was embarrassed to express

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
